extendedInfo.description: Find the perfect property (flat, house, apartment building, parking place, office) to buy or rent, save your searches, search and find properties to rent or buy in your location, create a list with your favourite properties â you can do all this and more quickly and comfortably with ImmoScout24âs app. With more than 60,000 current ads, youâre sure to find the flat, house, land, parking place, etc., of your dreams.Special features:â QuickSearch: find houses, flats, garages, commercial property, etc., to buy or rent immediately.â Watch list: create a list of your favourite properties.â Personal property evaluation: evaluate each house or flat and make a note of your first impressions.â Short cuts: save each search as a link on the start page.â Search history: previous searches and viewed properties are saved and can be accessed at any time.â Map function: see the location of the property on a map.â ImmoScout24 code: this number will lead you directly to the right property on ImmoScout24â Recommendations: send interesting ads to your partner or friend directly via email.We will be happy to answer any questions and enquiries you may have about the app. Please contact helpdesk@immoscout24.ch or tel: +41 (0)31 744 17 40.Other apps from Scout24 AG Switzerland: AutoScout24.ch, MotoScout24.ch

reviews.comment: Works well on my xperia. Just not easy to find a flat in Zurich...

reviews.title: Ganz ok
